Description:
We are seeking a talented and driven Talent Acquisition Associate to join our team in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. As a Talent Acquisition Associate, you will be responsible for sourcing, attracting, and hiring top talent for our organization. You will play a crucial role in ensuring that we have a strong and diverse workforce that can drive our company's success.Responsibilities:Develop and implement effective sourcing strategies to attract a diverse pool of qualified candidates
Utilize various recruitment channels, such as job boards, social media, and professional networks, to identify potential candidates
Review resumes and conduct initial screenings to assess candidates' qualifications and fit for the role
Coordinate and schedule interviews with hiring managers and candidates
Conduct reference checks and background screenings for selected candidates
Manage the offer process and negotiate compensation packages with selected candidates
Collaborate with hiring managers to understand their hiring needs and develop job descriptions
Participate in career fairs and other recruitment events to promote our employer brand and attract potential candidates
Maintain accurate and up-to-date candidate records in our applicant tracking system
Stay current on industry trends and best practices in talent acquisitionSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field
Proven experience in talent acquisition or recruitment
Strong understanding of recruitment strategies and best practices
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to build strong relationships with hiring managers and candidates
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities
Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills
Proficient in using applicant tracking systems and other recruitment tools
Knowledge of local labor laws and regulations
Experience in using social media and other digital platforms for recruitment

Proactive and results-oriented mindset
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Strong attention to detail
Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information
Strong organizational and time management skills
